quote: Sleep is death enjoyed.
author: Friedrich Hebbel

quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm an insomniac, my mind works the night shift.
author: Pete Wentz,  Gray

quote: I cannot sleep unless I am surrounded by books.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I wonder why I don't go to bed and go to sleep. But then it would be tomorrow, so I decide that no matter how tired, no matter how incoherent I am, I can skip on hour more of sleep and live.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: I am restless when I rest. I sleep like I’m engaged in an invisible wrestling match. Naturally, I almost always win.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace. God is awake.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep.
author: Walter Scott

quote: I spend several days at a time without enough sleep. At first, normal activities become annoying. When you are too tired to eat, you really need some sleep. A few days later, things become strange. Loud noises become louder and more startling, familiar sounds become unfamiliar, and life reinvents itself as a surrealist dream.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: I make love with a focus and intensity that most people reserve for sleep.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.

quote: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I've got an overactive brain. I enjoy work, I enjoy life, and I'm not good at relaxing. I've also never slept very much due to this overactive imagination and my brain constantly thinking.
author: Rick Wakeman

quote: Sleep is the breakfast of champions. This morning I had two big bowls full, each two hours deep.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3

quote: The integrity of my sleep has been forever compromised, sir.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: I'm living a dream I never want to wake up from.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: If you wake up tired, you’ve been chasing dreams. If you go to bed tired, your making your dreams happen.
author: Benny Bellamacina,  The King of Rhyme

quote: Life is something that happens when you can't get to sleep.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Who said nights were for sleep?
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Sleep is good, he said, and books are better.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: I find out a lot about myself by sleeping. Dreams, they are who I am when I’m too tired to be me.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: When I am with you, we stay up all night.When you're not here, I can't go to sleep.Praise God for those two insomnias!And the difference between them.
author: Rumi

quote: It is a very funny thing that the sleepier you are, the longer you take about getting to bed.
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Silver Chair

quote: I was in my bed trying to figure out why sometimes you can wake up and go back to sleep and other times you can't
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Sleep frees our imaginations from the confines of its imprisonment. Last night I dreamt of penguins
author: B.B. Taylor

quote: The nicest thing for me is sleep, then at least I can dream.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: If you are a student you should always get a good nights sleep unless you have come to the good part of your book, and then you should stay up all night and let your schoolwork fall by the wayside, a phrase which means 'flunk'.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Every night, I have to read a book, so that my mind will stop thinking about things that I stress about.
author: Britney Spears

quote: I sleep when I blink. I dream like I love—continuously.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Before you sleep, read something that is exquisite, and worth remembering.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Take a nap in a fireplace and you'll sleep like a log.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Time to leave now, get out of this room, go somewhere, anywhere; sharpen this feeling of happiness and freedom, stretch your limbs, fill your eyes, be awake, wider awake, vividly awake in every sense and every pore.
author: Stefan Zweig,  The Post-Office Girl

quote: Every time I go to sleep, I know I may never wake up. How could anyone expect to? You drop your tiny, helpless mind into a bottomless well, crossing your fingers and hoping when you pull it out on its flimsy fishing wire it hasn't been gnawed to bones by nameless beasts below.
author: Isaac Marion,  Warm Bodies

quote: I love to sleep. Do you? Isn't it great? It really is the best of both worlds. You get to be alive and unconscious.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Sleep is a little death, dreams the whisperings of the Other, who would drag us all into his eternal night.
author: George R.R. Martin,  A Dance with Dragons

quote: Woke up this morning with a terrific urge to lie in bed all day and read.
author: Raymond Carver

quote: Every time I go to sleep, I know I may never wake up. How could anyone expect to? You drop your tiny, helpless mind into a bottomless well, crossing your fingers and hoping that when you pull it out on its flimsy fishing wire it hasn't been gnawed to bones by the beasts below. Hoping you pull up anything at all.
author: Isaac Marion,  Warm Bodies

quote: Dream by making and make by dreaming.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Now turn around and go to sleep. I'm warning you that I plan to sleep with you in my arms all night long.
author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

quote: My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
author: Cary Grant

quote: I do my best thinking at night when everyone else is sleeping. No interruptions. No noise. I like the feeling of being awake when no one else is.
author: Jennifer Niven,  All the Bright Places

quote: Free your mind from routine, keep your brain somewhere else
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Every morning I push through the pain—and force myself to keep sleeping, despite my aching body’s cries to quit. I am a champion.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: True wisdom gives the only possible answer at any given moment, and that night, going back to bed was the only possible answer.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: I wake up and tear drops, they fall down like rain. I put on that old song we danced to and then, I head off to my job cause not much has changed. Punch the clock, head for home, check the phone. Just in case. Go to bed, dream of you. That's what I am doing these days.
author: Rascal Flatts

quote: Sometimes he did not know if he slept or just thought about sleep.
author: Mark Strand

quote: Life is grace. Sleep is forgiveness. The night absolves. Darkness wipes the slate clean, not spotless to be sure, but clean enough for another day's chalking.
author: Frederick Buechner,  The Alphabet of Grace

quote: I wake to sleep, and take my waking slow. I feel my fate in what I cannot fear. I learn by going where I have to go.
author: Theodore Roethke,  The Collected Poems
